$
$
$
/$
/$
$
$
A World Class Entertainment Agency
​
For over 30 years, William Clare Entertainment has stood as a beacon in the entertainment industry, consistently introducing groundbreaking concepts and awe-inspiring shows. As one of the nation's premiere talent and entertainment agencies, WCE boasts a prestigious roster that caters to Performing Arts Centers, upscale country clubs, and exclusive five-star senior resorts. William Clare Entertainment is your gateway to an opulent realm of excitement, transforming ordinary events into extraordinary experiences.
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
President/Owner
/$
$
Gerry Cachia
/$
$
Gerry has been a force in entertainment since 1977. His experiences include marketing, directing, producing, managing, booking, and everything in between. With a background in marketing, Gerry is also the creative mind behind Team Tiger. His integrity and passion for entertainment drives the connections he has developed with clients and artists alike, and he is a ferocious leader to the WCE team.
​
gerry@williamclare.com
O: 727-789-4594
C: 727-423-9825
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Sales Manager/SE FL Agent
/$
$
Craig Neier
/$
$
Craig is the consummate talent agent. He knows how to plan and execute a flawless event, from the first phone call to the final curtain call. Having been an entertainer himself, Craig also understands the importance of developing relationships with venues and artists alike.  His resourcefulness and nationwide connections make him an esteemed member of the William Clare family!
​
craig@williamclare.com
O: 727-789-4594
C: 908-642-8991
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Entertainment Consultant/SW FL Agent
/$
$
Tom Porter
/$
$
Tom is a lifelong musician and businessperson. He is the founder of some of the region's premier tribute bands, has worked with and performed at venues throughout Florida, and has extensive experience in project management, marketing, artist development and booking - all of the tools necessary to contribute to WCE and enhance and develop the relationships with their clients and artists.
​
tom@williamclare.com
O: 727-789-4594
C: 917-882-2487
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Vice President/Owner
/$
$
Kelly DiRoma
/$
$
Kelly is no stranger to the entertainment business. Raised amidst a family passionate about performing, she has toured regionally and nationally as a singer, dancer, and choreographer.  Kelly joined the WCE team in 2007.  After working all aspects of the agency for well over a decade, her ability to manage, promote, represent, and treat both clients and artists like family, led her to a partnership position.
​
kelly@williamclare.com
O: 727-789-4594
C: 727-403-5404
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Office Administrator
/$
$
Laura Kurisunkal
/$
$
Laura is the unsung hero of Team Tiger. She works tirelessly behind the scenes to make sure the contracts are accurate, the show details are all attended to, and that William Clare runs smoothly – all while maintaining a bright disposition and a nurturing demeanor. Laura has the efficiency and organization to be successful in any endeavor she chooses, and we sure are glad she chose William Clare!
​
laura@williamclare.com
O: 727-789-4594
C: 727-519-8574
